name: OORT
description: Find identities in OORT by IP Addresses and Emails

options.name: Client ID
options.description: The Client ID found on you OORT Polarity Integration

options.name: Client Secret
options.description: The Client Secret found on you OORT Polarity Integration

options.name: Audience
options.description: The Audience found on you OORT Polarity Integration

options.name: Token URL
options.description: Enter the URL for your OORT  token instance. This option defaults to pointing at the OORT production environment. Include the schema (https://)

options.name: API URL
options.description: Enter the API URL for your OORT instance. This option defaults to pointing at the OORT production environment. Include the schema (https://)
